tool_description: Irythia's Hearthstone API to access card information, statistics, and more.
name: Hearthstone
title: Hearthstone

api_list.name: All Cards
api_list.description: Retrieve information for all collectible cards in Hearthstone.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://irythia-hs.p.rapidapi.com/cards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "irythia-hs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://irythia-hs.p.rapidapi.com/cards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "irythia-hs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Single Card
api_list.description: Retrieves information for a single Hearthstone card.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of the card to fetch (in English)
